main event: A large rod-shaped object, resembling a flare, was observed hovering and moving slowly at an altitude of 3000-4000 feet in Sacramento, California, on August 3, 1952.
interesting points: The object was described as having an appearance akin to a flare,The sighting lasted for approximately one minute,Several sketches were made to illustrate the object's movement and position,Multiple witnesses in various control towers reported similar sightings during the same time frame,Observations noted that the object displayed unusual movement patterns and lacked sound.
witness description: Control tower personnel and former aircraft spotters who observed the object while on duty.
